00011 #ifndef __TSUBSET_H__
00012 #define __TSUBSET_H__
00013 
00014 // ROOT headers
00015 #include <TString.h>
00016 
00017 class TSubSet {
00018 
00019     public:
00020 
00021         TSubSet();
00022         ~TSubSet();
00023 
00024         // enum structures to uniquely specify sample properties
00025         enum Type {
00026             kDATA = 1,
00027             kMC = 2,
00028             kUNKNOWNTYPE=99
00029         };
00030 
00031         enum Flavour {
00032             kLIGHT=1,
00033             kCHARM=2,
00034             kBEAUTY=3,
00035             kUNKNOWNFLAVOUR=99
00036         };
00037 
00038         enum Process {
00039             kBGF=1,
00040             kRESOLVED=2,
00041             kUNKNOWNPROCESS=99
00042         };
00043 
00044         enum Period {
00045             k03P = 1,       // NOTE: for DATA only
00046             k04P = 2,       // NOTE: for DATA only
00047             k0304P=3,       // NOTE: for MC only
00048             k05E=4,
00049             k06E=5,
00050             k06P=6,         // NOTE: for DATA only
00051             k07P=7,         // NOTE: for DATA only
00052             k0607P=8,       // NOTE: for MC only
00053             kUNKNOWNPERIOD=99
00054         };
00055 
00056         enum Q2 {
00057             kQ2g1=1,
00058             kQ2g1_5=2,
00059             kQ2g4=3,
00060             kQ2g8=4,
00061             kQ2g16=5,
00062             kUNKNOWNQ2=99
00063         };
00064 
00065         // getters
00066         // variables in the xml file
00067         TString       getYear() {return    fYear;};
00068         TString       getType() {return    fType;};
00069         TString       getFlavour() {return    fFlavour;};
00070         TString       getQ2() {return fQ2;};
00071         TString       getCNversion() {return    fCN_version;};
00072         TString       getNamePattern() {return    fName_pattern;};
00073         unsigned      getTriggerPeriod() {return fTriggerPeriod;};
00074         Float_t       getLuminosity() {return    fLuminosity;};
00075         Float_t       getLuminosityRecalculated() {return    fLuminosity_recalculated;};
00076         // enumerated variables, defined from the above ones
00077         Flavour       getFlavourENUM() {return fFlavourENUM;};
00078         Period        getPeriodENUM() {return fPeriodENUM;};
00079         Q2            getQ2ENUM() {return fQ2ENUM;};
00080         Type          getTypeENUM() {return fTypeENUM;};
00081         // unique ID
00082         unsigned      getID() {return fID;};
00083 
00084         // setters
00085         void          setYear(TString year) {fYear = year;};
00086         void          setType(TString type) {fType = type;};
00087         void          setFlavour(TString flavour) {fFlavour = flavour;};
00088         void          setQ2(TString q2) {fQ2 = q2;};
00089         void          setCNversion(TString CN_version) {fCN_version = CN_version;};
00090         void          setNamePattern(TString name_pattern) {fName_pattern = name_pattern;};
00091         void          setTriggerPeriod(unsigned trigger_period) {fTriggerPeriod = trigger_period;};
00092         void          setLuminosity(Float_t luminosity) {fLuminosity = luminosity;};
00093         void          setLuminosityRecalculated(Float_t luminosity_recalculated) {fLuminosity_recalculated = luminosity_recalculated;};
00094         void          setID(unsigned id) {fID = id;};
00095         void          setFlavourENUM(Flavour flav) {fFlavourENUM = flav;};
00096         void          setPeriodENUM(Period period) {fPeriodENUM = period;};
00097         void          setQ2ENUM(Q2 q2) {fQ2ENUM = q2;};
00098         void          setTypeENUM(Type type) {fTypeENUM = type;};
00099         void          set
00100         
00101         // others
00102         void          Classify();
00103         void          Print();
00104         void          defineSampleName() {fSampleName = fType+fYear+fCN_version+fName_pattern;};
00105         TString       getSampleName(){ return fSampleName;};
00106         void          operator= (TSubSet);
00107 
00108     private:
00109 
00110         // this duplicates the "sample" structure in the xml file
00111         TString       fYear;
00112         TString       fType;
00113         TString       fFlavour;
00114         TString       fQ2;
00115         TString       fCN_version;
00116         TString       fName_pattern;
00117         unsigned      fTriggerPeriod;      // id of the trigger subperiod; 0 if all used simultaneously
00118         Float_t       fLuminosity;
00119         Float_t       fLuminosity_recalculated;
00120 
00121         // variables to allow easy random-access;
00122         // are defined from above ones but can also be set with public setters
00123         Flavour       fFlavourENUM;
00124         Period        fPeriodENUM;        // this is different from "year" because data from several years
00125                                           //  several years (03-04, 06-07) can form a single period; see comments in Classify()
00126         Q2            fQ2ENUM;
00127         Type          fTypeENUM;
00128         Process       fProcessENUM;
00129 
00130         // other variables defined from an xml-file
00131         TString       fSampleName;
00132 
00133         // a unique identifier of the subset
00134         unsigned      fID;
00135 };
